title: Unable to purchase bundle [ gemstone]
body:
After debating on this for a while I decided to give the Splenderous bundle a go... except it won't let me purchase it.

I hovered over it and I do have enough RP for it. I click on it and the box to purchase is completely greyed out.

I wondered about the Splended bundle- the same thing- the box is greyed out.

Buuut if I wanted to I'm sure I could purchase a skin- those boxes aren't greyed out.

I already logged and re-logged JUST to see if my RP balance was in fact false. It's still 2534.

so... are the bundles just temporarily locked? [ you'd think there would be a server message about this]

replies.body: It doesn't seem like the store is having any widespread issues with bundles purchases at the moment, but I'm curious if you remembered to check that little box on the bundle screen? That needs to be checked in order to buy any bundle items.
